title: OMI_physics_shape Capsule Shape
description: Parameters describing a capsule physics shape.

height.description: The mid height of the capsule shape in meters, the distance between the centers of the two capping hemispheres.

radiusBottom.description: The radius of the bottom of the capsule (the hemisphere located along -Y) in meters.

radiusTop.description: The radius of the top of the capsule (the hemisphere located along +Y) in meters.
